item.title: Conference Volunteer
item.description: Helped manage the unconference digital topic board. Assisted speakers before and after presentations

item.title: Editor and Board Member: STC TCBOK
item.description: Help decide the future of the Body of Knowledge. Assess priorities for TCBOK projects. Edit content for spelling, grammar, and style. Create forms for reader submissions. Clean up HTML in WordPress. Create content.
